index.speaker: dan-gartner
index.name: Zero to Continuous Delivery in an Hour with Visual Studio Team Services
index.description: This demo-paced session will walk attendees through the end-to-end process of creating a Continuous Delivery pipeline using Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS). We will check code into a git repo, create an automated build that compiles our code and runs our unit tests, and create a release pipeline to promote the application and run automated smoke tests through a series of Azure environments using VSTS. And we will do all of this in an hour.
index.title: Zero to Continuous Delivery in an Hour with Visual Studio Team Services  | Sessions | MKE DOT NET
index.metaDescription: Zero to Continuous Delivery in an Hour with Visual Studio Team Services
